src_original: saṃsārābhirateṣu saṃsāragaticakravinivartanacittā,  śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānābhimukheṣu sattveṣu sarvajñatāmārgapratiṣṭhāpanacittā /  evaṃ cittamanasikāraprayuktā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra anena sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukhena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā  ye sattvā andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau parikrānteṣu manuṣyeṣu bhūtasaṃghānucaritāyāṃ  taskaragaṇasaṃkīrṇāyāṃ viṣamacāritrasattvadikcaritāyāṃ kālābhrameghajālasaṃchannāyāṃ
tgt_original: 我於惡眾生發大慈心，於不善業眾生發大悲心，於修善眾生發歡喜心，於善惡眾生發無二心，於染污眾生發清淨心，於邪道眾生發正道心，於樂不淨眾生發樂淨心，於樂生死眾生發隨順法輪心，於樂聲聞、緣覺眾生發安立一切智道心。

src_original: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhopasthānena tuṣṭiṃ vindāmi,  teṣāṃ ca dhārmikīṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidadhāmi /  anupūrveṇa ca tān sarvajñatāyāṃ paripācayāmi /
tgt_original: 一切城邑聚落眾生，我悉救護，令得安樂，廣為說法，教令漸求一切種智。

src_original: kālikāvātameghavikiraṇatāyai kaluṣodakātikramaṇatāyai viṣamavātamaṇḍalīvikiraṇatāyai  mahormivegavyupaśamanatāyai āvartabhayavimocanatāyai digudyotanatāyai samyagudakapathapratipādanatāyai tīradarśanatāyai /  ratnadvīpopanayanāya mārgaṃ saṃdarśayāmi saṃgrāhakarūpeṇa sārthavāhakarūpeṇa /  kasyacidrājarūpeṇa jagarājarūpeṇa kūrmarājarūpeṇa asurarājarūpeṇa garuḍarājarūpeṇa  kinnararājarūpeṇa mahoragarāgarājarūpeṇa sāgaradevatārūpeṇa kaivartarūpeṇa pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
tgt_original: 於夜闇人靜，鬼神、盜賊所遊行時，比丘離威儀時，重雲煙塵昏蔽、日月不見色時，若有眾生在城邑、聚落、山巖、曠野、八方、大海，乃至一切水陸眾生，於此眾生以種種方便，滅其恐怖。 若有眾生，遭於海難、雲難、山難、大風洄澓，及以波浪迷惑失道，不見邊岸，遭如是等種種海難，我於爾時或作船形，或作馬王、象王、狗王、阿脩羅王、海神王形，作如是等形，方便度脫眾生海難。

src_original: tacca kuśalamūlamevaṃ pariṇāmayāmi - sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhaveyaṃ sarvaduḥkhaskandhavinivartanatāyai /  sthalagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ mohāndhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau veṇukaṇṭakaśarkarakaṭhallākīrṇāyāṃ  ghoraviṣoragasaṃkīrṇāyāṃ nimnonnataviṣamapracārāyāṃ rajoreṇusamuddhatāyāṃ viṣamavātavṛṣṭisaṃkṣobhitāyāṃ (Gv 173)  śītoṣṇaduḥkhasaṃsparśāyāṃ vyālamṛgendrasābhiśaṅkāyāṃ vadhakataskaragaṇānuvicaritāyāṃ  dharaṇyāṃ diksaṃmūḍhānāṃ sattvānāmādityarūpeṇa udgatacandrarūpeṇa maholkāpātarūpeṇa  devarūpeṇa bodhisattvarūpeṇa sattvānāṃ trāṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
tgt_original: 為陸地眾生，或作淨月及諸星宿、炬火、電光、諸寶光明、天身光明、菩薩光明，以如是等無量方便，救護眾生。

src_original: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvakleśāndhakāravidhamanatāyai /
tgt_original: 發如是心： 『我為一切眾生常作歸依，除滅煩惱。

src_original: parvataprapātagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇabhayabhītānāṃ jīvitapratilambhāya yaśaskāmatāvaśagatānāṃ kīrtiśabdadhvajakāmānāṃ bhogārthikānāṃ
tgt_original: 令畏死者，得無畏法；

src_original: bhavāmi - yaduta giriguhāsaṃsthānābhinirhāreṇa phalamūlabhojanābhinirhāreṇa jalapathodapānābhinirhāreṇa
tgt_original: 』為在山眾生，或作果樹、或作流泉、迦陵頻伽鳥等，出妙音聲；

src_original: śītoṣṇapratipakṣābhinirhāreṇa samyakpathanidarśanena kalaviṅkarūtanirghoṣeṇa mayūrarājanikūjaghoṣeṇa  auṣadhijvalanāvabhāsarūpeṇa parvatadevatāprabhārūpeṇa /  giriguhādarivivaragatānāṃ vividhaduḥkhopadrutānāṃ timirāndhakāravinivartanatāyai samapṛthivītalābhinirhāreṇa śaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /  evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathā ahameṣāṃ parvatagatānāṃ sattvānāmārakṣāṃ karomi,
tgt_original: 或作山神、或作平地，以如是等無量方便，度脫眾生。

src_original: yaduta mahābhavanavimānagatānāṃ sattvānāmanabhiratiṃ saṃjanayāmi /  tāni tāni ca daurmanasyāni vyapanayāmi /  sarvābhiniveśavyavacchedāya sarvadharmasvabhāvaparijñāyai ca dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若見眾生在家宮殿，心樂著者，為彼說法，令知諸法真實之性；

src_original: vanagahananiḥsaraṇadiśamaprajānatāṃ samyaggamanapathasaṃdarśayitrī bhavāmi /
tgt_original: 『令諸眾生免此山難，又令一切越生死山。

src_original: mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginījñātisālohitasamavadhānagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ cirakālasaṃjātasnehānāṃ buddhabodhisattvasamavadhānapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi  bhāryāputrasamavadhānagatānāṃ (Gv 221)
tgt_original: 若見眾生與父母兄弟歡娛讌集，為彼說法，令與諸佛菩薩共會；

src_original: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena vividhadṛṣṭigahanagatān sattvāṃstṛṣṇājālasaṃsaktān vicitrasaṃsāraduḥkhabhayopadrutān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayeyam /  mārgaṃ saṃdarśya etānabhayakṣeme pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena  saṃsāraṭavīkāntāraprāptān sattvān durgatipathapratipannān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocya
tgt_original: 』為曠野眾生，種種方便令其悅樂，入正見道，除滅飢渴，於如是等無量難中，救眾生已，復作是念：

src_original: sattvānāṃ sarvasaṃsāraratitṛṣṇāprahāṇāya sarvasattvasamacittatāyai mahākaruṇāpratilābhāya
tgt_original: 若見眾生妻子歡會，為彼說法，令竭生死愛欲之海，具足大悲，等觀一切；

src_original: atyantayogakṣeme sarvajñatāmārge pratiṣṭhāpayeyam /
tgt_original: 『願令眾生速滅眾苦，究竟一切安隱智道。

src_original: deśajanapadāviṣṭānapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvānabhiniveśādhikārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavamānān  vividhairudbadhyamānopāyaistato janapadābhiniveśāduccālya evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi -
tgt_original: 』見樂著國土眾生受諸苦惱，種種方便滅其樂著，作如是念：

src_original: dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  antarāpaṇamadhyagatānāṃ sattvānāmāryasaṃghatathāgatadarśanasamavadhānasamavasaraṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  bhogamadamattānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṣāntipāramitāparipūraṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  nṛttagītavādyābhiratānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmārāmaratyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若見眾生處王宮殿，為彼說法，悉令逮得賢聖快樂；

src_original: viṣayaratigṛddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgataviṣayasamavasaraṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若見眾生著境界者，為彼說法，令得如來甚深境界；

src_original: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān skandhālayābhiniveśāduccālya anālayasarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyam /
tgt_original: 『願令眾生除五陰著，住一切佛薩婆若境。

src_original: krodhāviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṣāntipāramitāpratiṣṭhāpanatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  kusīdānāṃ sattvānāṃ vīryapāramitāpariśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若見眾生起瞋恚者，為彼說法，令得如來羼提波羅蜜； 為懈怠者，演說正法，令得菩薩清淨毘梨耶波羅蜜；

src_original: vibhrāntacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatadhyānapāramitāpratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為亂心者，演說正法，令得如來禪波羅蜜；

src_original: grāmagatānapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvān gṛhaniketabandhanabaddhānandhakāratamisrāyāṃ  rātrau vividhagṛhāpadduḥkhitān nānodvegamukhairudbadhya saṃjanitasaṃvegacittān dhanadānena  saṃgṛhya samyak prīṇayitvā anikete dharme pratiṣṭhāpya
tgt_original: 』見著聚落眾生受諸苦惱，種種方便而為說法，令其厭離，以法攝之，復作是念：

src_original: dṛṣṭikṛtagahanapraskannānāṃ sattvānāmavidyāndhakārapatitānāṃ dṛṣṭikṛtagahanāvidyāndhakāravinivartanatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  duṣprajñānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為邪癡者，演說正法，令得般若波羅蜜；

src_original: traidhātukābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃsāraduḥkhaniḥsaraṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為著三界者，演說正法，令出三有；

src_original: hīnādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatabodhipraṇidhānaparipūraye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為樂小法者，演說正法，令其滿足菩提大願；

src_original: evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān svāyatanagrāmasaṃniśritān saṃsāragativiṣayagocarāduccālya sarvajñatāgocare pratiṣṭhāpayeyam
tgt_original: 『令一切眾生離六入空聚，超出生死，究竟得入一切智城。

src_original: ātmahitaprayuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvasattvahitāvahanapraṇidhānaparipūraye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為自安者，演說正法，令具大願，饒益一切；

src_original: durbalādhyāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvabalapāramitāviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為心劣者，演說正法，令得菩薩力波羅蜜；

src_original: (Gv 174)  ye ca kulaputra andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrāvekaikaśaḥ pūrvādidigvidikṣu sarvadiksaṃmūḍhā bhavanti,  sameṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣu viṣamaprapātasaṃjñinaḥ,  unnateṣvavanatasaṃjñinaḥ,  avanateṣūnnatasaṃjñinaḥ,
tgt_original: 』「復次，善男子！ 若有眾生迷於十方，以東為西，以西為東，乃至以上為下，以下為上，為此眾生，無量方便，斷其迷惑。

src_original: teṣāmahaṃ digmārgadeśasaṃmūḍhānāṃ nānāvidhairupāyairavabhāsaṃ kṛtvā niṣkramitukāmānāṃ dvāraṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若欲出者，開示門戶；

src_original: avidyātamondhakāracetasāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvajñānapāramitāviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為無智者，演說正法，令得菩薩智波羅蜜；

src_original: virūpakāyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatarūpakāyaviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為無色者，演說正法，令得如來清淨色身；

src_original: visaṃsthitaśarīrāṇāṃ sattvānāmanuttaradharmakāyaviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  durvarṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ sūkṣmatathāgatasuvarṇavarṇacchavitāyai kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaśarīratāviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為危脆身者，演說正法，令得無上清淨法身； 為惡色者，演說正法，令得如來清淨妙色；

src_original: gantukāmānāṃ mārgaṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若失道者，示導正路；

src_original: duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmatyantatathāgatasukhapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為苦惱者，演說正法，令得如來無上快樂；

src_original: sukhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvajñatāsukhapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  glānānāmāturāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ pratibhāsopamabodhisattvakāyapariniṣpattaye dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  vicitraratiprasaktānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvacaryāratipratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /  daridrāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvadharmanidhānakośapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
tgt_original: 為貧窮者，演說正法，令得菩薩諸清淨藏；

src_original: taritukāmānāṃ tīrthaṃ saṃdarśayāmi /  praveṣṭukāmānāṃ bhavanaṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
tgt_original: 若欲度者，示以津濟；

src_original: bodhisattvavivarṇakānāṃ mātṛghātadrohiṇāmanapakāravairiṇāmāryāpavādakānāmasatpuruṣādharmasamācāragocarāṇāṃ  staupikasāṃghikavastudrohiṇāṃ mātāpitṛvipratipannānāmānantaryakarmakāriṇāṃ mahāprapātābhimukhānāṃ  samantabhadreṇa mahāyānena daśabalajñānabhūmimārgaṃ saṃdarśayeyam /  buddhaviṣayamapi daśabalapariniṣpattimapi buddhadhāraṇībalamapi sarvabuddhaikaśarīratāmapi saṃdarśayeyam /  saṃdarśya cainān sarvabuddhasamatājñāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyam //
tgt_original: 』計著眾生及福伽羅陰界諸入，不了因果，行不善道，殺害眾生，乃至邪見、不孝父母，不供養沙門、婆羅門，遠離正道，行不善業，誹謗正道，欲壞法輪，毀菩薩眾，憎惡大乘，不讚菩提，毀呰賢聖，行惡人法，造五逆業，如是等類諸惡眾生，我以明淨慧光除其愚闇，令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，究竟普賢菩薩所行，開十力道，遠離生死，現一切智城，諸佛境界，諸佛神通，具足諸力，現法持力，安住諸佛平等正法，現一切佛悉同一身。

src_original: anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ sānāthyaṃ karomi /  kṛpaṇadaridrāṇāṃ dhanakanakaskandhena saṃgrahaṃ karomi (Gv 175)
tgt_original: 我見貧、苦、老、病眾生，種種方便而救濟之。

src_original: evamahametānanuttareṇa dharmasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhya sarvakleśebhyaḥ parimocayeyam /  jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ samatikrāmayeyam /  sarvadurgativinipātabhayebhyaḥ parimocayeyam /
tgt_original: 『以無上法攝彼眾生，滅諸煩惱，令得解脫，離生、老、病、死、憂悲、苦惱、惡道諸難。

src_original: kalyāṇamitraparigrahe pratiṣṭhāpayeyam /  dharmaratnadānasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhṇīyām /  anavadye karmaṇi niyojayeyam /  tathāgataśarīraviśuddhaye samādāpayeyam /  atyantājarāmaraṇadhātuprativedhe pratiṣṭhāpayeyam //
tgt_original: 近善知識，深入法界，離諸惡業，淨佛法身，置無老、病、死，常住法界。

src_original: mithyāsaṃkalpagocarāṇāṃ viṣamakāyavāṅbhanaskarmasamudācāriṇāmasaṃvṛtacāriṇāṃ nānāvratatapaḥsaṃniśritānāmasamyaksaṃbuddhe  samyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñināṃ samyaksaṃbuddhe ca asamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñināṃ śarīrātāpanaparitāpanaprayuktānām  utsasarohradataḍāganadīparvataprasravaṇadigvidikpraṇāmaparāyaṇānāṃ pāpamitravaśagatānāṃ
tgt_original: 我見諸惡眾生，遠離正道，趣於邪徑，著諸倒見，虛妄迷惑，具行不善，身、口、意業種種放逸，依止惡法，於非正覺為正覺想，於正覺所非正覺想。

src_original: nānopāyamukhaiḥ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /  laukikāyāṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpya divyamānuṣikāyāṃ saṃpattau saṃniyojayāmi /  evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhametān sattvānevaṃrūpādviṣamapratipattiduḥkhātparimocayāmi,

src_original: anantamadhyadikpraveśaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇamadhyatiṣṭhat /  dīrghādhvasaṃvasanasaṃbhavaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇamadhyatiṣṭhat /  anantakāryasaṃpūrṇavijñaptisaṃbhavaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇamadhyatiṣṭhat /
tgt_original: 善知識者，是不可壞力。 因善知識，遍遊十方，斷生死流，悉能成辨一切大事；

src_original: anantamadhyamārgavyūhasaṃbhārakramaṇaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇamadhyatiṣṭhat /  samantamukhavikramasaṃbhavaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇamadhyatiṣṭhat /  anuccalanāgamanavikramaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇamadhyatiṣṭhat //
tgt_original: 莊嚴正道，得普門法門，一切無礙； 見善知識，不離本處，遍至十方一切佛所。

src_original: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāravīryaparākrameṇa kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,  mahāpraṇidhānasāgarābhinirhāravikrameṇa kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
tgt_original: 爾時，善財即時了知，見善知識，成滿無量諸大願海； 得一切智，饒益眾生；

src_original: ekaparamāṇurajasi sarvadharmadhātvanucaraṇavilambavikrameṇa mahāvīryakavacavarmaṇā kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
tgt_original: 滅除未來無量劫苦，以大莊嚴而自莊嚴。 一一微塵中，修行一切諸法界法；

src_original: kṣetrabhūtaṃ sarvajagacchukladharmavirohaṇatayā,  dharaṇibhūtaṃ sarvalokapratiśaraṇatayā,
tgt_original: 菩提心者，則為良田，長養眾生白淨法故； 菩提心者，則為大地，能持一切諸世間故；

src_original: sarvadiksamudraprasarānujavanena kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,  ekavālapathe aparāntakalpabodhisattvacaryāsaṃvasanena kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
tgt_original: 見十方海，知未來劫諸語言法及菩薩行，究竟一切諸菩薩行；

src_original: bodhisattvacaryāprāptasya praticittakṣaṇaṃ sakalasarvajñatājñānapratiṣṭhānena kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
tgt_original: 於念念中，得一切智，神力自在，諸莊嚴道；

src_original: sarvadharmadhātunayasrotaḥprasṛtamārgākrameṇa kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
tgt_original: 不離法界境界，而能往詣充滿法界善知識所。

src_original: sarvadharmadhātunayārambaṇānuccalitena sakaladharmadhātuspharaṇena kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena yena pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ //  so 'paśyat pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ rātridevatāṃ bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍale puṣpagarbhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇāṃ
tgt_original: 爾時，善財往詣喜目觀察眾生夜天，見彼夜天在如來所，於大眾中，處寶蓮華師子之座；

src_original: samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajaṃ bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannām /
tgt_original: 正受菩薩普光喜幢法門，一切毛孔，出眾妙雲。

src_original: sarvasattvāvimānanāparityāgatāyai ādhyātmikabāhyasarvavastuparityāgitāyai (Gv 189)  mahāduṣkaraparityāgasaṃdarśanatāyai sarvaloke yathāśayasattvadānacaryāsaṃdarśanatāyai  dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasaraparyāpannānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vijñaptimāgacchato 'paśyat
tgt_original: 智慧行雲，饒益眾生，離於諍訟，不著諸法； 以平等心，普攝眾生，顯三世菩薩修行布施，悉捨內外難捨之物，十方眾生，皆悉覩見。

src_original: yadutācintyabodhisattvavṛṣabhitāvikurvitapratilābhena //  sarvaromavivarebhyaḥ sarvasattvasamāpannānaupapattinirmāṇakāyameghānniścaritvā sarvalokadhātuparyāpannān
tgt_original: 又於一切毛孔，出眾生數等菩薩變化身雲，充滿法界，現眾生前；

src_original: sarvasattvān spharitvā abhimukhaṃ sarvavratasamādānākampyatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān sattvadhātusamaṃ  nānātapovratamaṇḍalamudyotayamānān sarvasarvalokaniśrayatāṃ sarvaviṣayānavekṣatāṃsarvasaṃsārasaṃvāsavimukhatāṃ
tgt_original: 顯示正受不動三昧，覺悟眾生不樂三界。

src_original: divyamānuṣasaṃpattivipattisukhasamavasaraṇatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān aśubhamaṇḍalamudyotayamānān,
tgt_original: 遠離世間，滅除生死，現天人中種種成敗；

src_original: śubhasaṃjñāviparyāsaṃ loke vinivartayamānān,
tgt_original: 教諸眾生，修不淨觀，除淨想倒；

src_original: anityacalavyayapariṇāmadharmatāṃ paridīpayamānān,  duḥkhānātmasarvasaṃskāradharmatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 說有為行，無常變易，苦惱之法；

src_original: tathāgataviṣayasaṃvāsāvipravāsatāṃ rocayamānān,  atyantatathāgataśīlapariśuddhaye sattvān samādāpayamānān,
tgt_original: 令諸眾生，深入佛戒，未曾暫離，受持諸佛清淨禁戒；

src_original: sarvasattvayathāśayarutaśīlacaryāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvasattvasaṃtoṣaṇaśīlasugandhikatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvasattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
tgt_original: 現無疑戒，及以香戒戒香，普熏一切眾生。

src_original: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca sarvasattvadhātusamāpannān nānāvarṇātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgacchedādhivāsanatāṃ  sarvasattvakāyotpīḍanopakramaṇādhivāsanatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 又於一切毛孔，出眾生數等妙色身雲，顯示眾生，截諸肢節，皆悉能忍，堪受眾苦；

src_original: sarvasattvāsatyavacanākrośaparibhāṣaṇakutsanapaṃsanatāḍanatarjanādhivāsanatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvasattvākṣobhyatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān sarvasattvasatkārānunnāmāvanāmatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 一切訶責惡罵，皆悉忍受。 於彼眾生，不生恚心，恭敬讚歎，不生愛心；

src_original: sarvasattvanirabhimānatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvadharmasvabhāvakṣāntyakṣayatākṣayajñānatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 於一切眾生，不起我慢，顯現諸法自性之忍，顯現無盡菩提心智；

src_original: sarvasattvasarvakleśaprahāṇāya kṣānticaryāṃ saṃdarśayamānān sarvasattvānāṃ,
tgt_original: 除滅一切眾生煩惱，修習忍法，行菩薩行；

src_original: visaṃsthitadurvarṇāśrayaśarīratāṃ vyāvartayamānān sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ tathāgatavarṇaviśuddhiṃ saṃvarṇayamānān sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat  sarvaromavivarebhyaśca sarvasattvasamānnānāvarṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhān nānopapattikasattvakāyanirmāṇameghānniścārya  yathāśayān sattvān spharitvā sarvajñatāmahāsaṃbhāravīryaparākramatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 顯現清淨金剛之身，顯現如來清淨無上色身，隨其所應，教化眾生。 又於一切毛孔，出諸趣種種色身雲，勇猛精進，現一切智；

src_original: sarvamārakalivikiraṇavīryatāṃ bodhyārambhākṣobhyāvivartyavīryatāṃ sarvasattvasaṃsārasāgarottāraṇavīryatāṃ
tgt_original: 勇猛精進，現菩提境界而不退轉； 勇猛精進，降伏諸魔； 勇猛精進，於生死海，悉能救度一切眾生；

src_original: vāribhūtaṃ sarvakleśamalanirdhāvanatayā,
tgt_original: 菩提心者，則為淨水，洗濯一切煩惱垢故；

src_original: sarvākṣaṇāpāyadurgativinipātapathavinivartanavīryatāmajñānaparvatavikiraṇavīryatāṃ
tgt_original: 勇猛精進，除滅一切惡道諸難； 勇猛精進，壞無智山；

src_original: sarvatathāgatapūjopasthānāparikhedavīryatāṃ sarvabuddhadharmacakrasaṃpratīcchanasaṃdhāraṇavīryatāṃ
tgt_original: 勇猛精進，恭敬供養一切如來，心無疲倦； 勇猛精進，受持守護諸佛法輪；

src_original: sarvāvaraṇaparvatanirbhedanavikiraṇavīryatāṃ sarvasattvaparipākavinayāparikhedavīryatāṃ
tgt_original: 勇猛精進，壞散一切諸障礙山；

src_original: sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanavīryatāmanuttarāṃ tathāgatavīryaviśuddhiṃ saṃdarśayamānān  sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
tgt_original: 勇猛精進，嚴淨一切諸如來剎，得諸如來清淨精進，教化度脫一切眾生。

src_original: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca nānāvarṇasaṃsthānān vividhātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā nānopāyaiḥ sattvānāṃ prītiṃ saṃjanayamānān,  daurmanasyaṃ vinivartayamānān,
tgt_original: 又於一切毛孔，出種種色身雲，以諸方便，除滅眾生愁憂苦惱，悉令歡喜；

src_original: sarvakāmaratiṃ vijugupsamānān,  hrīdharmatāṃ loke prabhāvayamānān,  guptendriyatāyāṃ sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānān,  anuttarabrahmacaryaṃ (Gv 190)
tgt_original: 厭惡五欲，讚歎慚愧，調伏諸根，修行無上清淨梵行；

src_original: sabhayaṃ kāmalokamāraviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  vigatakāmaratīnāmapi sarvalokakāmarativiṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 身、口、意善，顯現世間一切所欲，皆不可樂；

src_original: vāyubhūtaṃ sarvalokāniketatayā,
tgt_original: 菩提心者，則為大風，一切世間無障礙故；

src_original: sarvabodhisattvasamādhisamudravikurvaṇatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  bodhisattvābhijñāvikurvitavṛṣabhitāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 除滅眾生一切煩惱，顯現菩薩諸三昧海，通明自在神力境界；

src_original: sattvānāṃ prītiṃ saṃjanayamānān,  prāmodyamutpādayamānān,  daurmanasyaṃ vyāvartayamānān,  cittakalyatāmāvahayamānān,  cittakarmaṇyatāṃ kurvāṇān,
tgt_original: 令諸眾生，皆悉歡喜，身心柔軟，滅煩惱熱，得清涼樂，長養正法。

src_original: āśayaṃ viśodhayamānān,  indriyāṇyuttāpayamānān,  kāyasukhaṃ saṃjanayamānān,  dharmaprītivegaṃ vivardhayamānān sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //  sarvaromavivarebhyaśca sarvopapattisadṛśaśarīrānnānākāyameghānniścaritvā sarvakṣetragatasarvasattvābhimukhābhirucitadarśanatāyai  sarvācāryagurukalyāṇamitropasthānaparicaryāparikhedatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 又於一切毛孔，出諸趣種種身雲，詣一切剎諸佛師長，善知識所，恭敬供養，心無疲倦。

src_original: sarvatathāgatadharmacakrapravartanasaṃpratīcchanasaṃdhāraṇāparikhedavīryatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 受持一切諸佛法輪；

src_original: sarvadharmamukhasamudrān pravicinvānān,  sarvabuddhasamudrāvatāraṇanayaṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,
tgt_original: 究竟一切佛海； 顯現一切法海；

src_original: sarvadharmalakṣaṇasvabhāvanayamabhidyotayamānān,
tgt_original: 顯現一切諸法實相；

src_original: sarvadharmān,  samādhidvāraṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 顯現一切諸三昧門，清淨智慧；

src_original: sarvasattvadṛṣṭiparvatanirbhedanaṃ prajñāvajraṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  anekacittakṣaṇasamāyogena sarvasattvāvidyāndhakāravidhamanaprajñādityamaṇḍalodāgamaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 分別一切眾生心海，金剛智慧； 壞散一切眾生諸邪見山，出生圓滿明淨慧日。

src_original: sarvasattvaprītisaṃjananatayā sarvajñatāyāṃ sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
tgt_original: 於一念中，悉能除滅一切眾生愚癡闇冥，令諸眾生，皆悉歡喜，得薩婆若。

src_original: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca sarvajagatsamānudārācintyanānāvarṇavikalpasaṃsthān ātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā
tgt_original: 又於一切毛孔，出一切眾生數等身雲，現種種色身、不思議身，隨其所應，悉現其前；

src_original: yathāśayādhimuktasarvasattvābhimukhasthitān nānārutamantrasaṃskāranirdeśaiḥ sarvalaukikapuṇyābhijñatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvalaukikakṛtyapracārataśca sarvatraidhātukasaṃbhavasaṃdarśanataśca sarvatraidhātukaniḥsaraṇadiksaṃvarṇanataśca  sarvadṛṣṭikāntāragahananiḥsaraṇadiksaṃdarśanataśca sarvajñatāmārgaviśeṣatāṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,  śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipathasamatikramaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  saṃskārāsaṃskārānunayapratighānunaye 'pratighānunayatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 以無量音，為諸眾生，演說世間功德之藏。 世間行業，一切三界，皆不可樂； 歎離三界諸惡邪見，遠離邪道，向一切智，超出聲聞、緣覺之地。 於有為無為，心無所著； 背捨生死，正向涅槃；

src_original: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca ekaikasmādromavivarāt sarvakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā  sarvasattvalokābhimukhasthitān samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,  sarvadharmadhātuviśuddhiniṣṭhāpraṇidhānavaiśeṣikatāṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,
tgt_original: 又於一一毛孔，出一切佛剎微塵等變化身雲，普現一切諸眾生前，修普賢行，滿普賢願，讚歎究竟一切大願。

src_original: praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvalokadhātusamudrapariśuddhiṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,
tgt_original: 於念念中，嚴淨一切諸世界海；

src_original: sarvatathāgatapūjopasthānāpratiprasrabdhiṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,  praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmanayasāgarāvatārāpratiprasrabdhiṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,  praticittakṣaṇaṃ tathāgatabalapraveśāpratiprasrabdhatāṃ (Gv 191)  praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvalokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamasarvadharmadhātunayasāgarāvataraṇāpratiprasrabdhīḥ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 於念念中，恭敬供養一切諸佛； 於念念中，悉能受持一切法海；

src_original: sarvakṣetreṣvaparāntādhiṣṭhānakalpasaṃvāsasarvajñatāmārgaviśuddhisaṃprakāśanāpratiprasrabdhatāṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,
tgt_original: 於念念中，一一微塵中，出生一切世界海、微塵等法界方便海，住持一切剎、一切劫，淨一切智道，未曾休息；

src_original: praticittakṣaṇaṃ tathāgatabalapraveśāpratiprasrabdhatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvatryadhvanayasāgarāvatārāpratiprasrabdhatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 於念念中，悉入一切諸如來力，究竟三世方便海。

src_original: bodhisattvasarvakṣetrarddhivikurvitasaṃdarśanāpratiprasrabdhatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  bodhisattvapraṇidhānacaryāsaṃdarśanena sarvasattvān sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayamānānapaśyat //
tgt_original: 於一切剎，現自在力，令一切眾生，修菩薩行，成滿大願，得一切智。

src_original: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca ekaikasmādromavivarāt sarvajagaccittasamān kāyanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā sarvasattvābhimukhasthitānaparyantaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhārabalaṃ  abhedyāparyādattāvināśadharmasarvajñatācittabalaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 又於一一毛孔，出一切眾生心等身雲，悉現一切諸眾生前，顯現無量一切智力，不可窮盡，無能壞者；

src_original: avivartyāpratyudāvartyādhiṣṭhānāpratiprasrabdhamanuttarasarvabodhisattvacaryāsamudāgamabalaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvasaṃsāradoṣānanulepabalatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃvarṇayamānān,  sarvamāramaṇḍalavikiraṇabalaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 修不退轉菩薩諸行，於生死法，心無所染，降伏眾魔，滅煩惱力，壞散一切障礙山力，具大悲力。

src_original: sarvakleśamalānanulepakleśabalatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvakarmāvaraṇaparvatavikiraṇabalaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvakalpasaṃvāsabodhisattvacaryāparikhedamahākaruṇābalaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvabuddhakṣetrasaṃprakampanasaṃkṣobhaṇasarvasattvasaṃpraharṣaṇabalaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,  sarvamāraparapravādigaṇapramardanabalaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
tgt_original: 於一切劫，修菩薩行，心無疲倦，震動一切諸佛世界，令眾生喜，轉淨法輪，建立法幢，制諸外道；

src_original: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca ekaikasmādromavivarāt sarvajagaccittasamādānānantavarṇakāyanirmāṇasamudremeghānniścaritvā  daśadiganantasattvadhātuspharaṇān yathāśayādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvacaryājñānavikramaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人學善射術，先自安立。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，學一切智地，先自安立菩提之心，必得一切佛法。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如幻師，先讀幻術，然後示現一切幻事。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心，然後顯現一切諸佛菩薩正法。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
tgt_original: 「譬如幻術，非色現色。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaścārūpyānidarśanaḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ viṭhapayati sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaiścittotpādavaśitāmātreṇa /  tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,  evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñatācittotpādādhyāśayaprayogavicāramātreṇa sarvakarmakleśā vilayamāpadyante /
tgt_original: 菩提心相亦復如是，顯現法界功德莊嚴。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人著閻浮檀金莊嚴之具，映蔽一切，悉如聚墨。

src_original: evameva bodhicittajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkārādhyāśayāvabaddho bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇālaṃkārānabhibhavati jihmīkaroti /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以菩提心莊嚴之具，蔽諸眾生，聲聞、緣覺，所有功德。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
tgt_original: 「譬如阿夜揵多鐵，此鐵少分，悉能毀壞一切餘鐵，諸鉤鎖縛。

src_original: evameva kiyatparītto 'pyadhyāśayotpāditaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādadhātuḥ  sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāvidyātṛṣṇābandhanāni sphoṭayati /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，斷諸邪見煩惱愛縛。

src_original: evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,  tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti,  na saṃdadhati /
tgt_original: 菩提心風亦復如是，隨所行處，除諸煩惱，悉無障礙，不住聲聞、緣覺解脫。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人善入大海而不沒溺，摩伽羅魚所不能害。

src_original: evameva adhyāśayabodhicittaviddhāśrito (Gv 404)  bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārakarmakleśabhayavinivṛtto bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhābhisamayāntaraprāptyanughātyo bhūtakoṭīsākṣātkriyāpraṇāśapathāpatanatayā
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，以菩提心入生死海，不為生死之所染污，亦不證實際聲聞、緣覺，摩伽羅魚所不能害。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人服食甘露，一切眾患所不能害。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,  na coparamati bodhisattvamahākaruṇāpraṇidhānāt /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，服菩提心甘露法藥，不墮聲聞、緣覺之地，修習大悲，滿足願行。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人用翳身藥，以塗其目，自在遊行，無能見者。

src_original: evameva bodhicittotpādaprajñāpraṇidhyupastabdho bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣayeṣu cānuvicarati,  sarvamāraiśca na dṛśyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，得菩提心滿足大願，自在遊行，入魔境界，一切眾魔所不能見。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人依恃大王，不畏餘人。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādamahādharmarājasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvāvaraṇanivaraṇadurgatibhyo na bibheti /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，依菩提心大力法王，除滅障蓋，不畏惡道。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra parvatagṛheṣu sarvabhūmyantargatapānīyabhayānnāstyagnibhayam,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人居深水內，不畏火焚。

src_original: evameva bodhicittakuśalamūlābhiṣyanditasaṃtānasya bodhisattvasya nāsti śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktijñānāgnibhayam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，居菩提心善根水內，聲聞、緣覺解脫之火，所不能燒。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人依恃猛將，不畏怨敵。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，依菩提心，不畏諸惡。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
tgt_original: 「譬如釋天執持金剛，降伏一切諸阿脩羅。 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，執菩提心摧滅諸魔，及餘外道。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人服阿羅娑藥，不瘦不老，延壽無窮。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,  na ca saṃsāradoṣairlipyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，服菩提心阿羅娑藥，於無量劫在生死中，修菩薩行，無所染著。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
tgt_original: 「譬如阿羅娑藥，初用淨水。

src_original: evameva sarvabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānasaṃbhārayogeṣu sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati,  na kvacidduṣyati /
tgt_original: 菩提心藥亦復如是，一切菩薩所修行中，最為先首。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人，諸根法中，命根為首。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhadharmādāneṣu bodhicittaṃ pūrvaṃgamam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，諸佛正法菩提之心，最為其首。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人命根斷故，不能利益父母親族。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，離菩提心，不能饒益一切眾生。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudraḥ sarvaviṣairadūṣyo bhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如大海，無能壞者。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādamahāsamudro 'dūṣyo bhavati sarvakarmakleśaśrāvakapratyekabuddhacittotpādaviṣaiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提心海亦復如是，聲聞、緣覺不能沮壞。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍalamaparyantaḥ sarvatārāvabhāsaiḥ,
tgt_original: 「譬如日光，諸星宿光所不能蔽。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādasūryamaṇḍalamaparyāpannaṃ bhavati,  sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatārānāsravaguṇānabhibhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提心日亦復如是，圓滿大願智慧日光，聲聞、緣覺無漏慧光，所不能蔽。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
tgt_original: 「譬如太子初生，已為大臣之所尊重。

src_original: evameva acirotpāditabodhicittastathāgatadharmarājakulapratyājāta ādikarmiko bodhisattvaściracaritabrahmacaryān vṛddhaśrāvakānabhibhavati bodhicittamahākaruṇādhipatyena
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心已，為一切聲聞、緣覺所共尊重，修大悲故。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,  na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
tgt_original: 「譬如王子年雖幼少，一切大臣皆悉敬禮。

src_original: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,  na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，發菩提心，聲聞、緣覺皆悉敬禮。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra (Gv 405)  sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
tgt_original: 「譬如王子雖未自在，已具成就國王儀相。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra pariśuddhamaṇiratnaṃ cakṣustimiradoṣeṇāpariśuddhamityābhāsamāgacchati,
tgt_original: 「譬如目翳，見真淨寶，謂為不淨。

src_original: evameva prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ sarvajñatācittotpādaratnaṃ sattvā aśraddhānayanājñānatimiradoṣeṇāpariśuddhamiti saṃjānanti /
tgt_original: 菩提心寶亦復如是，無智不信，起不淨想。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
tgt_original: 「譬如呪藥，若有眾生見聞共住，一切眾病，皆悉除愈。

src_original: evameva sarvakuśalamūlopacayaprajñopāyavidyauṣadhisaṃgṛhītaṃ bodhicittasaṃprayuktaṃ  bodhisattvapraṇidhijñānaśarīraṃ śravaṇadarśanasaṃvāsanānusmṛtiprayogena sattvānāṃ  kleśavyādhīn praśamati /
tgt_original: 菩提心藥亦復如是，長養善根，攝智慧藥，滿足大願菩薩慧身，若有眾生見聞共住，修正念者，皆悉除滅煩惱諸病。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
tgt_original: 「譬如恒娑相衣，不受塵垢。

src_original: evameva bodhicittotpādahaṃsalakṣaṇavastraṃ saṃsārakleśakardamadoṣairna kliśyate /
tgt_original: 菩提心衣亦復如是，不受一切生死塵垢。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,  sarvakriyāścānubhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如有人常持甘露，專念不散，而能分別一切諸法。

src_original: evameva bodhicittotpādapraṇidhimūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhītaṃ sarvajñatāpraṇidhijñānaśarīraṃ bodhisattvakriyāsamarthaṃ bhavati,  na ca vikīryate sarvajñatāpraṇidhiśarīratvāt /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦復如是，持菩提心甘露正法，正念不散，而能教化一切眾生，令具大願，成智慧身。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
tgt_original: 「譬如犁無有扼則不堪用。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādādhyāśayaviyukto bodhisattvo buddhadharmapariniṣpādanāsamartho bhavati,  evaṃ ca te bodhyaṅgasaṃbhārāḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，離正直心，於如來法，無有實義。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
tgt_original: 「譬如轉輪王有妙天冠，名曰象藏；

src_original: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
tgt_original: 洗彼冠時，四種兵眾，遊行虛空。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni
tgt_original: 菩提心冠亦復如是，淨諸菩薩一切善根，遠離三有，如來智慧無為境界，虛空中行。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netarādratnākarādutpadyate 'nyatra vajrākarātsuvarṇākarādvā,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛從金性生，非餘寶生。

src_original: evameva vajropamaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /  sa netarātsattvāśayakuśalamūlaratnākarādutpadyate 'nyatra sattvaparitrāṇamahākaruṇāvajrākarāt sarvajñajñānādhyālambanamahāsuvarṇākarādvā /
tgt_original: 菩提心寶亦復如是，大悲救護眾生性生，非餘善生。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra astyamūlā nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ /
tgt_original: 「譬如有樹不從根生，而能長養枝葉華果。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate,  sarvapuṇyajñānābhijñāsaṃkusumitaścasa sarvalokopapattiṣu mahāpraṇidhānajālībhūtaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
tgt_original: 菩提心樹亦復如是，無所依止，而能長養一切種智，通明大願，普覆世間。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,  nāpi cchidraśuṣirabhājanena śakyaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra acchidrabhāja 'nena,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，非一切器盡能發明，亦非諸器盡能容持。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu  nādhyāśayavipannacalācalabuddhisarvabhājanena śakyaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra bodhisattvādhyāśayaratnabhājanena /
tgt_original: 菩提心寶亦復如是，小心慳結，無智者器不能發明，諂曲邪見眾生器中，不能容持。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvaratnāni nirvidhyāti,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，能壞眾寶。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ sarvadharmaratnāni nirvidhyati /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，決定了知一切諸法。

src_original: tadyathā vajraṃ sarvaśailāni bhinatti,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，能壞眾山。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ sarvadṛṣṭigataśailāni bhinatti /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，壞散一切諸邪見山。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，雖破不全，一切眾寶猶不能及。

src_original: evameva āśayavipattibhinnamapi sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkārānabhibhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，雖小懈怠，聲聞、緣覺諸功德寶，所不能及。

src_original: (Gv 406) tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
tgt_original: 「譬如破金剛，猶能除滅諸貧困苦。

src_original: evameva pratibhinnamapi sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvasaṃsāradāridryaṃ vinivartayati /  tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pi vajradhātuḥ sarvamaṇipāṣāṇabhedalakṣaṇaḥ,
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，雖復小失威儀趣法，猶能除滅諸貧窮苦。 「譬如小金剛，悉能破壞一切諸物。

src_original: evameva kiyatparīttārambaṇaprasṛto 'pi sarvajñatācittotpādavajradhātuḥ sarvājñānabhedalakṣaṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，緣小境界，能破一切無知癡惑。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，非常人所得。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ  na prākṛtādhyāśayānāmitvarakuśalamūlānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ hastagataṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，非小心眾生之所能得。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，無智術者所不能識。

src_original: evameva duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣapudgalo bodhisattvacittamahāprajñāvajraratnaguṇānabhijño nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，無智眾生所不能識。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，無能消滅。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切諸法不能消盡。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛器仗，一切眾生，乃至摩訶那伽，不能執持，除那羅延力。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādamahāvajrapraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhamahānagnairapi
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，聲聞、緣覺不能受持，除諸菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛器仗，無不鑒徹，非餘器仗之所能為。

src_original: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,  tatra sarvajñatācittotpādamahāvajrapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo 'parikhinnamānasaḥ prasahate,  na pratihanyate /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，觀察三世，教化眾生，阿僧祇劫受無量苦，聲聞、緣覺所不能及。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，餘不能持，除金剛地。

src_original: evameva sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairbodhisattvaniryāṇapraṇidhānasaṃbhāravajraṃ na śakyaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatrādhyāśayabodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhapṛthivītalena
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，出生菩薩行願功德，聲聞、緣覺所不能持，除薩婆若正直心者。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra dṛḍhavajratalācchidrabhājanatvānmahāsamudre pānīyaṃ na visarati,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛器中盛水，不可消盡。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，安住勝妙迴向善根，入生死趣，諸不善法不能消盡。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，能持大地，不令墜沒。

src_original: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，持諸菩薩一切願行，不令墜落，沒於三界。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajramudakena na klidyate,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，於百千劫，處於水中而不爛壞，亦無變異。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛，一切大火不能燒熱。

src_original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ sarvasaṃsāraduḥkhāgnidāhairna dahyate,  sarvakleśāgnitāpairna saṃtapyate /
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，一切生死貪恚癡火，不能燒熱。

src_original: tadyathā kulaputra tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhimaṇḍe  niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
tgt_original: 「譬如金剛道場之座，能持菩薩，降伏諸魔，成等正覺，餘不能持。

src_original: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ  paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ  vyākaraṇaṃ saṃpratīcchatāṃ sarvabodhisattvamārgasaṃbhāramupastambhayatāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ
tgt_original: 菩提之心亦復如是，能持一切菩薩願行，諸波羅蜜、諸忍、諸地，迴向受記，修菩提道，供養諸佛，聞法受行，一切諸心所不能持。

src_original: iti hi (Gv 407) kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩提之心，成就如是無量功德；

src_original: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,  yairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni /
tgt_original: 若有眾生發菩提心，則具如是無量功德。

src_original: tasmāttarhi kulaputra sulabdhāste lābhāḥ,
tgt_original: 是故，善男子！

src_original: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
tgt_original: 汝得善利，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，修菩薩行，具足如是無量功德。

src_original: api ca kulaputra yadvadasi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,  kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti /
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 汝先所問： 『云何菩薩學菩薩行、修菩薩道者？

src_original: gaccha kulaputra,  asya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantaraṃ praviśya vyavalokaya /  atra jñāsyasi yathā bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,  śikṣamāṇasya ca yādṛśī guṇapariniṣpattirbhavati //
tgt_original: 』汝今入是明淨莊嚴藏大樓觀者，則能了知學菩薩行、修菩薩道，具足成就無量功德。

src_original: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evamāha - vivṛṇu ārya asya kūṭāgārasya dvāram /
tgt_original: 」爾時，善財童子敬遶彌勒菩薩，合掌白言：

src_original: pravekṣyāmi /
tgt_original: 「唯願大聖開樓觀門，令我得入。

src_original: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya kūṭāgārasya dvāramūlamupasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā acchaṭāśabdamakārṣīt /  tasya dvāraṃ vivṛtamabhūt /  sa āha - praviśa kulaputra etatkūṭāgāram /  atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paramāścaryaprāptastatkūṭāgāraṃ prāviśat /
tgt_original: 」爾時，彌勒菩薩即彈右指，門自然開，善財即入；

src_original: tasya samanantarapraviṣṭasya taddvāraṃ saṃvṛtamabhūt /
tgt_original: 入已，還閉。

src_original: so 'drākṣīt taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ bahuyojanaśatasahasravistīrṇaṃ gaganatalāpramāṇaṃ  samantādākāśadhātuvipulam asaṃkhyeyacchatradhvajapatākālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnālaṃkāram /  asaṃkhyeyamuktāhārapralambitālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnahārapralambitālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyalohitamuktāhārapralambitālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyasiṃhamuktāhārapralambitālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyasiṃhadhvajālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyacandrārdhacandrālaṃkāram
tgt_original: 爾時，善財觀察樓觀，廣大無量，猶如虛空，眾寶為地。 有阿僧祇窓牖，却敵欄楯，七寶合成阿僧祇幡幢蓋莊嚴，阿僧祇寶瓔珞垂帶，阿僧祇大師子幢半月寶像，諸寶繒綵。

src_original: asaṃkhyeyamaṇijālaprabhālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyahemajālālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnapaṭṭālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnasuvarṇasūtrapratyuptālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaghaṇṭāmadhuranirghoṣālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnakiṅkiṇījālasamīritamanojñaśabdālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyadivyapuṣpaughābhipravarṣaṇālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyasuvarṇacūrṇasaṃpravarṣaṇālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaharmyajālālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyagavākṣālaṃkāram
tgt_original: 又阿僧祇天冠寶衣而以莊嚴，阿僧祇寶網羅覆其上，阿僧祇金鈴，自然演出微妙音聲。 又雨無量寶華鬘雲，諸妙香雲，雨阿僧祇細末金屑，放阿僧祇勝妙光明，普照一切。

src_original: asaṃkhyeyatoraṇālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaniryūhālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyādarśamaṇḍalaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratneṣṭakānicitālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnabhittyalaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyasthūṇālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnavastrameghālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnavṛkṣālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnavedikālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnapathālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnacchadanasarvavyūhālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyabhūmitalapratiṣṭhānavicitravyūhālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnanicitaprāsādālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnāsanālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyamaṇikanyālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyaratnapaṭṭasaṃstṛtacaṃkramālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyajāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇakadalīstambhasuvibhaktālaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyasarvaratnavigrahālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyabodhisattvātmabhāvālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyapakṣigaṇavicitramanojñarutānuravitālaṃkāram
tgt_original: 有阿僧祇異類眾鳥，出和雅音。

src_original: asaṃkhyeyaratnapadmālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnayaṣṭisaṃdhāraṇālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyapuṣkariṇyalaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyapuṇḍarīkālaṃkāram  (Gv 408) asaṃkhyeyaratnasopānālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaratnavāmakaviracanālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyavicitraratnanicitabhūmyalaṃkāram  asaṃkhyeyamahāmaṇiratnaprabhāpramuktālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyasarvaratnavyūhālaṃkāram asaṃkhyeyaguṇavarṇasamuditālaṃkāram /
tgt_original: 雨阿僧祇優鉢羅鉢曇摩分陀利華，出阿僧祇摩尼寶光，普照一切。

src_original: tasya ca mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantare tadanyāni kūṭāgāraśatasahasrāṇyevaṃrūpavyūhālaṃkṛtānyevāpaśyat  asaṃkhyeyaratnacchatradhvajapatākālaṃkārāṇi yāvadasaṃkhyeyaguṇavarṇasamuditālaṃkārāṇi ca /  tāni kūṭāgārāṇi vipulavistīrṇānyapramāṇākāśakośabhūtānyapaśyat samantāt suvibhaktāni /  te cāsya kūṭāgāravyūhā anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyāmaitrībhūtā anyonyāsaṃkīrṇāḥ pratibhāsayogena ābhāsamagaman ekasminnārambaṇe /  yathā ca ekasminnārambaṇe,
tgt_original: 於樓觀內，具有百千諸妙樓觀，不相障礙，莊校嚴飾，亦如上說。

src_original: tathā śeṣasarvārambaṇeṣu //  atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya  idamevaṃrūpamacintyaviṣayavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā atulaprītivegavivardhitena mahāharṣaprāmodyena
tgt_original: 爾時，善財覩見樓觀不可思議眾妙莊嚴，心大歡喜，踊躍無量；

src_original: abhiṣyanditakāyacittaḥ sarvasaṃjñāgatavidhūtamānasaḥ sarvāvaraṇavivartitacittaḥ sarvamohavigato  'saṃpramoṣadivyanayanaḥ sarvaśabdāsaṅgasmṛtivijñaptiśrotraḥ sarvamanasikāravikṣepavigato  'nāvaraṇavimokṣanayanānusaraṇabuddhiḥ sarvadiksrotobhimukhena kāyapraśamena sarvārambaṇānāvaraṇasaṃpreṣitacakṣuḥ
tgt_original: 其心柔軟，離諸妄想，除滅一切愚癡闇障，正念思惟，專求妙趣，以無礙身恭敬作禮。

src_original: samanantarapraṇipatitamātraśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānabalena sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhyantarapraviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /  teṣu ca sarvakūṭāgāreṣu vividhavaimātryagatānyacintyaviṣayavikurvitānyadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 禮已，彌勒菩薩威神力故，諸樓觀中，自見其身，又見無量自在神力，不思議事。

src_original: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamaṃ praṇidhānacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  yannāmagotropapannena yena kuśalamūlena yayā samādāpanayā yena kalyāṇamitrasaṃcodanena  yadāyuḥpramāṇena yannāmake kalpe yatratathāgate yadvyūhe yādṛśyāṃ parṣadi yādṛśena  praṇidhānaviśeṣābhinirhāreṇa,  tatsarvamadrākṣīt,  yāvacca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya ca tathāgatasya tena samayenāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt,  tāvatkāle tasya tathāgatasya pādamulagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /  tāṃ ca sarvāṃ kriyāmapaśyat //
tgt_original: 或見彌勒，隨本種姓，壽命知識，長養善根，諸劫世界，一切佛所，及諸眷屬，因諸大願，初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心；

src_original: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamo maitrasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,  yata upādāya asya maitreya iti saṃjñodapādi tadadrākṣīt /  kvacidyatra caryāḥ cīrṇāḥ,  kvacidyatra pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,  kvacidyatra kṣāntiravatīrṇā,  kvacidyatra bhūmiravakrāntā,
tgt_original: 或見初得慈心三昧，因以為名。

src_original: kvacidyatra buddhakṣetravyūhāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,  kvacidyatra tathāgataśāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam,  kvacidyatra anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,  kvacidyatra vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  yathā vyākṛto yena vyākṛto yāvaccireṇa ca vyākṛtastatsarvamadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 或見彌勒行菩薩行，滿足一切諸波羅蜜，諸忍、諸地，淨佛世界，見諸如來，聞法受持，守護正法，為大法師，得無生忍，知某方處，某如來所，劫數多少，而得受記。

src_original: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ cakravartirājabhūtaṃ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayamānamapaśyat /
tgt_original: 或見彌勒為轉輪王，十善化世；

src_original: kvacillokapālabhūtaṃ sarvalokahitasukhaṃ sattvānāmupasaṃharamāṇam,
tgt_original: 或為四天王，饒益一切眾生；

src_original: kvacicchakrabhūtaṃ kāmaguṇaratiṃ sattvānāṃ vinivartayamānam,
tgt_original: 或為帝釋，訶責五欲；

src_original: kvacidbrahmabhūtaṃ dhyānāpramāṇaratiṃ sattvānāṃ saṃvarṇayamānam,
tgt_original: 或為夜摩天王，讚不放逸；

src_original: kvacitsuyāmadevādhipatibhūtamapramāṇaguṇān sattvānāṃ saṃvarṇayamānam,  kvacit saṃtuṣitadeveśvarabhūtamekajātipratibaddhabodhisattvaguṇānudbhāvayamānam, (Gv 409)  kvacitsunirmitadevarājabhūtaṃ sarvabodhisattvanirmāṇavyūhaṃ devaparṣadi saṃdarśayamānam,
tgt_original: 或為兜率天王，讚歎一生菩薩功德；

src_original: kvacidvaśavartidevarājabhūtaṃ sarvadharmavaśavartitāṃ devānāṃ saṃprakāśayamānam,
tgt_original: 或為化樂天王，讚自在法；

src_original: kvacinmāratvaṃ kārayamāṇam,  sarvasaṃpattyanityatāṃ devānāṃ deśayamānam,
tgt_original: 或為魔王，說無常法；

src_original: dharmajñānasāgaravigāhanāya dharmajñānamāyāpratilambhāya asuraparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayamānamapaśyat /  kvacitkūṭāgāre yamalokamadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 或為梵王，讚歎四無量心； 或為阿脩羅王，調伏眷屬，入大智海，了達諸法悉如幻化；

src_original: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prabhayā mahānarakānavabhāsya narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvanirayaduḥkhaṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 或為閻羅王，放大光明，普照地獄，滅一切苦。

src_original: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pretabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulamannapānamupasaṃhṛtya kṣutpipāsāṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 或以肴膳飲食，施諸餓鬼；

src_original: kvacitkūṭāgāre tiryagyonau vividhopapatyāyatanavimātratayā tiryagyonigatān sattvān vinayantamadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 或為畜生受種種身，而為說法，除其癡闇；

src_original: kvacitsarvapāramitāparipūraye 'pramāṇatāṃ kvacitsarvaśikṣābhimukhāvatārasamatāṃ kvacitsamādhimukhapraveśavistīrṇatāṃ  kvacidbodhisattvacaryāvinayopāyamukhapraveśatāṃ kvacitpraṇidhānābhinirhāravistīrṇatāṃ  kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ caṃkramābhiyuktaṃ sabhāgacaritairbodhisattvaiḥ  sārdhaṃ lokahitakriyārthaṃ vividhaśilpaśānaśāstraviśeṣāṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhānopasaṃhitatāṃ  saṃgāyamānamapaśyat /  kvacidekajātipratibaddhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvabuddhajñānābhiṣekamukhaṃ saṃgāyantamapaśyat /
tgt_original: 或見滿足一切波羅蜜，入於平等諸法忍門、廣三昧門、樂深法門，修禪三昧，出生通明，充滿一切，行菩薩行，隨順世間，成就大願； 或見與同行菩薩俱，饒益眾生； 或見與一生菩薩，諸佛現前，授記者俱。

src_original: kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ caṃkramābhiyuktaṃ varṣaśatasahasrairanikṣiptadhuramapaśyat /

src_original: kvaciddharmalekhanaprayuktaṃ kvacinmaitrīsamādhisamāpannaṃ kvacitsarvadhyānāpramāṇāni
tgt_original: 或入諸禪，四無量心，解脫三昧，一切入等；

tgt_original: 天身雲，諸龍、夜叉，乃至摩睺羅伽身雲，四天王身雲，乃至梵王身雲，轉輪聖王、王子、大臣、長者、居士、聲聞、緣覺、如來身雲，復見一一毛孔中，出一切眾生等化身雲。

src_original: bodhisattvaguṇavarṇamukhāni dānapāramitāmukhāni śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyapraṇidhānabalajñānapāramitāmukhāni
tgt_original: 讚歎菩提心功德門，檀波羅蜜門，乃至願波羅蜜門；

src_original: saṃgrahavastudhyānāpramāṇasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāvidyādhāraṇīpratibhānasatyapratisaṃvicchamathavipaśyanāvimokṣamukhapratītyasamutpādapratiśaraṇadharmoddānasmṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgaśrāvakayānakathāpratyekabuddhayānakathāmahāyānakathābhūmikṣānticaryāpraṇidhānamukhāni  evaṃ sarvadharmamukhapraveśaśabdānniścarato 'śrauṣīt /
tgt_original: 四攝諸禪、無量三昧、通明總持、諸諦諸辯、止觀解脫、緣起念處、正勤神足、根力覺道、聲聞、緣覺二乘所行、菩薩大乘、諸地諸忍、菩薩願行，現如是等一切法門。

src_original: kvacitkūṭāgāre tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalasaṃnipātānadrākṣīt /  teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ nānāvimātratāṃ janmakulavimātratāṃ kāyavyūhāpramāṇavimātratāmāyurvimātratāṃ  kṣetravimātratāṃ kalpavimātratāṃ dharmadeśanāvimātratāṃ nirmāṇamukhavimātratāṃ saddharmasthitivimātratāṃ  yāvadaśeṣasarvākāraparṣanmaṇḍalavimātratāmadrākṣīt //  madhye ca vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya ekamudārataraṃ vistīrṇataraṃ ca tadanyasarvakūṭāgārāśeṣasarvavyūhātiriktataravyūhasamalaṃkṛtaṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīt /
tgt_original: 或於樓觀，見諸如來，大眾圍遶、又知諸佛家族不同，種姓不同，其身壽量劫剎，教授無量法門，正法住世，分別了知，皆悉不同。 爾時，善財諸樓觀中，見一樓觀，高廣嚴飾，勝妙於前，包容三千大千世界、百億閻浮提、百億兜率天。

src_original: sa tasya kūṭāgārasyābhyantare trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumadrākṣīt /  tasmiṃśca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭīśataṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ koṭīśataṃ tuṣitabhavanānāmadrākṣīt /  sa tatra jambudvīpeṣu maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ padmagarbhagataṃ jāyamānamapaśyat /  śakrabrahmābhyāṃ pratīkṣyamāṇaṃ saptapadāni prakrāntaṃ daśa diśo vyavalokayamānaṃ
tgt_original: 菩薩命終降神，受胎出生，遊行七步，觀察十方，大師子吼，帝釋、梵王恭敬奉侍，現童子身，處宮殿中，出遊園觀，以薩婆若心，出家苦行，現受乳糜，往詣道場，降伏眾魔，觀菩提樹，轉正法輪，昇天宮殿，方土劫數，眷屬壽量，行菩薩行，滿足大願，演說正法，教化眾生，現分舍利，皆悉不同。 大方廣佛華嚴經卷第五十九

tgt_original: 初發菩提心聲； 菩薩所行諸度願聲； 恭敬供養，不可思議諸佛音聲； 淨佛剎聲；

src_original: kvacitsarvajñatāprasthānaśabdamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmin lokadhātāvamuko nāma bodhisattvo  bodhicittamutpādayati amukaṃ dharmamukhaṃ śrutvā amukena kalyāṇamitreṇa samādāpito
tgt_original: 諸莊嚴具，亦出如是微妙音聲。 又聞某菩薩，在某世界，於某劫中，某知識化迴向善根，出生大願；

src_original: iyataḥ kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritvā iyadbhiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /

src_original: īdṛgnāmadheyaḥ īdṛśena āyuḥpramāṇena īdṛśyā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāsaṃpadā /

src_original: īdṛśena praṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa īdṛśena sattvavinayena īdṛśena śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvasaṃnipātena /  tasya parinirvṛtasya iyataḥ kalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,

src_original: iyān samartho bhaviṣyati /  kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma bodhisattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carannīdṛśāni duṣkaraparityāgaśatāni karoti /  amuko bodhisattvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati,  kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,  vīryamālabhate,  dhyānāni samāpadyate prajñāvicayaprayuktaḥ /  amuko bodhisattvaḥ saddharmaparyeṣṭiheto rājaparityāgaṃ karoti,

src_original: ratnaparityāgaṃ putraparityāgaṃ bhāryāparityāgaṃ hastapādanayanottamāṅgaparityāgaṃ karoti,  agniprapatanaṃ karoti /

src_original: amuko nāma bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataśāsanamabhyudgato dharmabhāṇakatvaṃ karoti,  dharmadānaṃ dadāti,  dharmayajñaṃ yajati,  dharmadhvajamucchrayati,  dharmabherīṃ parāhanti,  dharmaśaṅkhamāpūrayati,  dharmavarṣaṃ pravarṣati,

src_original: tathāgataśāsanaṃ dhārayati,  tathāgatacaityānyalaṃkaroti,  tathāgatavigrahān kārayati,  sattvasukhopadhānamupasaṃharati,  saddharmakośamārakṣati /

src_original: dharmaṃ ca deśayati evaṃnāmnābhiṣekeṇa īdṛśyāṃ parṣadi īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛśe kalpe īdṛśenāyuḥpramāṇena īdṛśyā dharmadeśanayā īdṛśena sattvavinayena īdṛkpraṇidhyabhisaṃbodhena /  evamekaikasmād ghaṇṭākiṅkiṇījālatūryādikādārambaṇādapramāṇadharmamukhavimātratānirghoṣānaśrauṣīt /
tgt_original: 又聞某佛，在某世界，於某劫中，成等正覺，眷屬多小，壽命長短，滿足大願，教化眾生。

src_original: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ nirghoṣāṇāṃ śraveṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vipulaprītivegābhiṣyandita cittastāni dharmamukhāni śṛṇoti /
tgt_original: 聞如是等不可思議微妙音聲，身心柔軟，歡喜無量；

src_original: kvacicchrāvakaparṣanmaṇḍalapratibhāsavijñaptiṃ kvacitpratyekabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍalapratibhāsavijñaptiṃ  kvacittathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalapratibhāsavijñaptiṃ (Gv 412)
tgt_original: 諸大菩薩、聲聞、緣覺；

tgt_original: 淨世界、不淨世界、雜世界；

tgt_original: 又見無量阿僧祇諸大菩薩，經行禪定，觀察諸法，發大悲心，普覆眾生，造種種論，辯眾義趣、或書經卷；

src_original: kāṃścitsvādhyāyamānān kāṃścillikhitaḥ kāṃścitparipraśnayataḥ kāṃścitrtriskandhadeśanāpariṇamanābhiyuktān  kāṃścitpraṇidhānānyabhinirharamāṇān //
tgt_original: 或問、或答，或見出生三種迴向，及諸大願，悉皆覩見如是等事。

src_original: tebhyaśca stambhebhyaḥ sarvamaṇirājaprabhājālāni niścaranti vyapaśyat /  kvacinnīlavarṇāni kvacitpītavarṇāni kvacillohitavarṇāni kvacidavadātavarṇāni kvacitsphaṭikavarṇāni  kvacittapanīyavarṇāni kvacidindranīlavarṇāni kvacidindrāyudhavarṇāni kvacijjāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇāni
tgt_original: 又見諸寶柱中，普放無量青黃赤白淨玻瓈色，因尼羅寶閻浮檀金諸光明網；

src_original: kvacitsarvaprabhāsavarṇāni kāyacittaprītisaṃjananaparamanayanābhirāmāṇi /  tāṃśca jāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇakadalīstambhān sarvaratnavigrahāṃśca puṣpameghāvalambitāpāṇīnadrākṣīt /  mālyadāmapāṇīn chatradhvajapatākāpāṇīn gandhadhūpavilepanapāṇīn vividharatnavicitrasuvarṇasūtrapāṇīn vividhamuktāhārapāṇīn nānāratnahārapāṇīn sarvavyūhaparigṛhītapāṇīn /  kāṃścidavanatacūḍāmaṇimakuṭān animiṣanayanān kṛtāñjalipuṭān namasyato 'paśyat /  tebhyaśca muktāhārebhyaḥ sarvagandhaparibhāvitāṣṭāṅgopetasūkṣmajaladharān prasravamāṇānapaśyat /
tgt_original: 又見珠瓔珞中，出八功德香水；

src_original: tebhyaśca vaiḍūryamaṇihārajālebhyo dīrghapaṅktīn kṣarantīnapaśyat /  tāni ca ratnacchatrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravyūhopaśobhitānyapaśyat /
tgt_original: 瑠璃寶中，出無量光明。

src_original: tāṃ ca ratnaghaṇṭākiṅkiṇījālapaṭṭadāmakalāpamaṇiśalākāvicitramaṇiratnakośasamalaṃkṛtagarbhāmapaśyat /  tābhyaśca puṣkiriṇībhyo 'saṃkhyeyāni ratnapadmotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkānyabhyudgatānyapaśyat /  kānicidvitastipramāṇamātrāṇi kānicidvyāmapramāṇamātrāṇi kānicicchakaṭacakrapramāṇamātrāṇi /
tgt_original: 又見優鉢羅鉢曇摩分陀利中，生諸妙華，大如車輪；

src_original: teṣu ca nānārūpān vyūhānapaśyat /  yaduta strīrūpān puruṣarūpān dārakarūpān dārikārūpān śakrarūpān brahmarūpān lokapālarūpān  devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragarūpān śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvarūpān  sarvajagadrūpasaṃsthānaśarīrān vicitranānāvarṇān kṛtāñjalipuṭānavanatakāyānnamasyato 'paśyat /
tgt_original: 華中悉見男女、大小、釋梵四王、諸龍、夜叉，乃至人、非人等，及諸象馬、聲聞菩薩、一切眾生，種種形類，皆悉恭敬，合掌禮佛。

src_original: kāṃścitpuṣpadāmāvalambitapāṇīn kāṃścidratnahārābhipralambitapāṇīn kāṃścitsarvavyūhaparigṛhītapāṇīn  kāṃścidavanatakāyān kṛtāñjalipuṭānanimiṣanayanān namasyataḥ kāṃścidabhiṣṭuvataḥ kāṃścitsamāpannān  kāṃścitsuvarṇavarṇāvabhāsān kāṃścidrūpyavarṇāvabhāsān kāṃścittuṣārasukumāravarṇāvabhāsān  kāṃścidindranīlamaṇivarṇāvabhāsān kāṃścidvirocanamaṇiratnāvabhāsān kāṃścitsarvaratnavarṇāvabhāsān  kāṃściccampakapuṣpavarṇāvabhāsān kāṃścitprabhākāyāvabhāsān kāṃścillakṣaṇavicitrātmabhāvānapaśyat /
tgt_original: 各各執持眾供養具，尊重讚歎，恭敬禮拜。

src_original: sarvabuddhadarśanasīmāvatikrameṇa bodhisattvasamādhinā,

src_original: sarvalokadhātutalāsaṃbhedena bodhisattvasamādhinā,
tgt_original: 分別一切世界輪三昧；

tgt_original: 分別一切眾生身三昧； 對現一切眾生身三昧； 分別一切音聲海三昧；

src_original: etatpramukhairanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbodhisattvasamādhivargāvatāraiste bodhisattvāstān bhagavato vairocanasya buddhavikurvitasamudrānavataranti  pūrvasabhāgacaritavikurvitaṃ ca samanusmaranti /
tgt_original: 如是等不可說佛剎微塵等三昧門，入如來海，入一切佛自在三昧；

src_original: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvadharmadhātuspharaṇenāvatāreṇa teṣāṃ punarbodhisattvānāṃ
tgt_original: 於念念中，充滿法界。

src_original: bhagavataḥ saṃmukhībhāvagatānāṃ jetavanānuprāptānāṃ daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuvipulanānāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanasaṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ  mahājñānābhijñāvikurvitaniryātānāṃ tīkṣṇajñānābhijñāvatibhūmyanuprāptānāṃ samantajñānavyavacārāṇāṃ
tgt_original: 彼諸菩薩，一一皆有妙師子座，悉與十佛世界等，現大自在甚深智慧，悉得諸地明淨智慧；

src_original: prajñākaragotrasaṃbhavānāṃ sarvajñajñānābhimukhānāṃ vitimirajñānacakṣuṣāṃ sattvasārathibhāvānuprāptānāṃ
tgt_original: 普觀一切，從智性生，專求一切智，具足成就，離癡慧眼。 悉為眾生作調御師；

src_original: sarvabuddhasamatānugatānāṃ sadāvikalpadharmacaraṇānāṃ sarvadharmārambaṇapratividdhānāṃ  sarvadharmaprakṛtiśāntarambaṇānāṃ sarvalokapraśāntanirvāṇālayaparamāṇāṃ sarvalokanānātvapratiṣṭhānām  aniketasarvakṣetragamanānām apratiṣṭhānasarvadharmapadānām anāryūhasavadhamavimānapratiṣṭhānāṃ
tgt_original: 修行諸佛平等正法，決定了知一切境界，分別了知一切世界，樂寂滅法，遠離世間，常好閑靜； 遊諸佛剎，無所染著； 於一切法，心無所依；

src_original: sarvajagatparipākavinayapratipannānāṃ sarvasattvakṣemagatisaṃdarśakānām abhyudgatajñānavimokṣabhavanagocarāṇāṃ  virāgakoṭyanugatajñānaśarīrāṇāṃ sarvabhavasamudroccalitānāṃ sarvajagadbhūtakoṭīvipaśyakānāṃ
tgt_original: 安住莊嚴妙法宮殿，教化成熟一切眾生。 為一切眾生，顯現佛剎，具足成就無上智門； 順離欲際，得智慧身，消竭一切諸有為海；

src_original: dharmasāgaraprajñāvabhāsamaṇḍalānāṃ sāgaravatīdhātusamādhisusamāhitamahākaruṇācittānāṃ
tgt_original: 為一切眾生，顯真實際，法海慧光，具足圓滿，皆悉安住堅固三昧。 以大悲心，常念眾生；

src_original: māyāgatadharmanayasupratividdhānāṃ svapnopamasarvalokadhātvavatīrṇānāṃ pratibhāsopamasarvatathāgatadarśanapratividdhānāṃ  pratiśrutkopamasarvarutaravitaghoṣavijñaptīnāṃ nirmitopamasarvadharmābhinirvṛttijñānapratividdhānāṃ
tgt_original: 解一切眾生皆悉如夢； 一切如來悉如電光； 一切言音皆悉如響； 了一切法皆悉如化。

src_original: susamārjitaviṣayapraṇidhānānāṃ samantajñānamaṇḍalaviśuddhikauśalyānugatānām  atyantaśāntapraśāntacittānāṃ sarvadhāraṇīgotrajñānaviṣayāṇāṃ acchambhitasamādhibalasamantaparākramāṇāṃ dharmadhātusthitikoṭīgatacakṣuṣāṃ (Gv
tgt_original: 滿足諸願，具菩薩行，普智圓滿，方便清淨，心樂寂靜，成滿一切諸陀羅尼智慧境界； 具足十力，遠離恐怖，安住法界，具淨法眼；

src_original: sarvadharmānilambhavihāraprāptānāṃ anantaprajñāsāgaravicāriṇāṃ jñānapāramitāpāraṃgatānāṃ  prajñāpāramitābalādhānaprāptānām ṛddhipāramitāsarvajagatpāraṃgatānāṃ samādhipāramitāvaśagatānāṃ
tgt_original: 得一切法無所有門，修行無量智慧大海，究竟到於智慧彼岸，悉得般若波羅蜜力，成就神通波羅蜜，度眾生海； 於三昧波羅蜜，悉得自在。

src_original: sarvatathāgatārthakauśalyāviparītajñānināṃ dharmakauśalyaprakāśanavidhijñānāṃ niruktijñānābhijñānāmakṣayapratibhānabaladharmameghānāṃ
tgt_original: 善知一切智無錯謬，巧妙方便，開示法藏； 具足辯才，成就大願； 具足諸力，法雲無盡。

src_original: vaiśāradyarṣabhasiṃhanādinām anālayadharmāsamaratiratānāṃ vitimirasarvadharmaprasāritacakṣuṣāṃ
tgt_original: 於大眾中，能師子吼，而無所畏； 常求正法，心無所著。 以淨慧眼，滅除癡闇；

src_original: sarvalokasaṃvittibhavajñānacandrāṇāṃ prajñāmaṇḍalasarvasatyanayavyavahāraraśmīnāṃ
tgt_original: 智月圓滿，照世生滅，成就智慧，放大光明； 照一切諦，善巧方便。

src_original: jñānavajrapuṇyacakravālānāṃ sarvaupamyaupamyasamatikrāntānāṃ sarvadharmendriyajñānāṅkuravirūḍhānāṃ  śūradhvajānāṃ sarvamāradhvajapramardanavīryāṇāmanantajñānamaṇḍalatejasāṃ sarvajagadabhyudgatakāyānāṃ
tgt_original: 智慧功德金剛之山，超出三世一切法王，覺無所畏智功德幢； 滅諸魔幢，建立精進圓滿智幢；

src_original: sarvadharmānāvaraṇaprajñānāṃ kṣayākṣayakoṭijñānavibuddhānāṃ samantakoṭyanugatabhūtakoṭipratiṣṭhānāṃ
tgt_original: 具足成就無上之身，得一切法無礙智慧； 覺了無盡智真實際，安住真際，修行決定無相三昧。

src_original: animittavyavaharaṇapratyavekṣajñānacakṣuṣāṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryābhinirhāranimittakuśalānām  advayajñānagocarāṇāṃ sarvalokagativipaśyakānām aniketasarvabuddhakṣetragatipratibhāsaprāptānāṃ
tgt_original: 巧方便生諸菩薩行，無二智慧，諦見境界世間諸趣，普照佛剎，無所染著；

src_original: sarvadharmāndhakāravigatānām atamojñānamaṇḍalapratipannānāṃ samantadigdharmāvabhāsaprayuktānāṃ
tgt_original: 於一切法除滅癡闇，究竟智慧，皆悉圓滿，放淨法光，照十方界。

src_original: sarvajadvareṇyapuṇyakṣetrānām amodhaśravaṇadarśanapraṇidhicandrāṇāṃ sarvalokābhyudgatapuṇyasumerūṇāṃ
tgt_original: 為一切眾生，作不虛福田； 若見聞者，所願成滿；

src_original: sarvaparapravādicakravinigrahaśūurāṇāṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraghoṣasvaraśabdanirnādināṃ
tgt_original: 為一切世間，功德須彌，遠離恐怖，伏諸外道。 以微妙音，遍一切剎；

src_original: sarvabuddhakāyātṛptadarśanānāṃ sarvabuddhaśarīrapratibhāsavaśavartināṃ jagadvinayānukūlakāyādhiṣṭhānānāṃ
tgt_original: 常見諸佛，心無厭足，成就如來自在法身，隨其所應而化度之；

src_original: sarvakṣetraprasaraikakāyaspharaṇānām abhisaṃskāravimaṇḍalapariśuddhānāmanāvaraṇagaganamahājñānayānapātrāṇāṃ  jñānamaṇḍalasarvadharmadhātukāyaprabhāsanānāṃ sarvajagaduditajñānādityānāṃ sarvajagaducitayathāśayabalānāṃ
tgt_original: 能以一身，滿一切剎； 以少方便，具足清淨自在神力，普遊十方無所障礙，智慧圓滿，遍照法界。 為一切眾耀明淨日，隨其所應，讚歎功德；

src_original: sarvajagadāśayendriyapratividdhajñānānām anāvaraṇaviṣayasarvadharmopapannānām anupapattisarvadharmasvabhāvavijñaptānāṃ
tgt_original: 了一切眾生諸根希望； 於一切法，得無諍境界；

src_original: sūkṣmodārānyonyasamavasaraṇajñānasaṃvardhitavartināṃ gambhīrabuddhabhūmigatiniścitānāṃ
tgt_original: 分別了知諸法自性，大小相攝。

src_original: gambhīrārthapadavyañjanavyavahārajñānānām akṣayapadavyañjanārthasūcakānāṃ sarvasūtrasāgaraikapadapraveśaprabhāṣamāṇānāṃ
tgt_original: 決了如來甚深之地，說句、味身，諸法深義，無有窮盡； 於一言中，普說一切修多羅海，究竟一切諸陀羅尼；

src_original: vipuladhāraṇījñānaśarīrādhiṣṭhānānām anantakalpasaṃdhāraṇānugatādhiṣṭhānānām ekacittakṣaṇānabhilāpyakalpasaṃvāsapratividdhajñānānām
tgt_original: 廣智慧身，究竟無量劫陀羅尼。 於一念中，決定了知不可說劫；

src_original: ekacittakṣaṇatryadhvajñānasarvalokābhijñānānāṃ sarvadharmadhāraṇyanantabuddhadharmasāgarapratibhāsānāṃ
tgt_original: 於一念中，了達三世法陀羅尼，普照無量諸佛法海。

src_original: sarvajagajjñānopanāyikadharmacakrapravartanānivartyānāṃ buddhaviṣayajñānāvabhāsapratilabdhānāṃ
tgt_original: 為一切眾生，起淨智慧，轉正法輪，無能壞者；

src_original: sudarśanasamādhisadāsamāpannānām asaṅgakoṭīsarvadharmaprabhedajñānābhijñānāṃ
tgt_original: 成就如來智慧境界，常入善現三昧正受，遠離障礙，深入諸法。

src_original: daśadigdharmadhātudiganuśaraṇapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvadigvibhaṅgadharmadhātusamavasaraṇānāṃ

src_original: sarvasattvaprītivegavivardhanaprayuktaiśca gandharvendraiḥ,
tgt_original: 令一切眾生歡喜乾闥婆王；

src_original: sarvapretagativinivartanaprayuktaiśca kumbhāṇḍendraiḥ,
tgt_original: 除滅一切餓鬼趣鳩槃荼王；

src_original: sarvasattvabhavasāgarābhyuddharaṇapraṇidhipratipannaiśca garuḍendraiḥ,  sarvalokābhyudgatatathāgatakāyabalapariniṣpattipraṇidhānasaṃjātaiśca asurendraiḥ,
tgt_original: 於生死海，拔濟眾生迦樓羅王； 正求薩婆若阿脩羅王；

src_original: tathāgatadarśanaprītilabdhaiśca praṇatakāyairmahoragendraiḥ,
tgt_original: 見佛歡喜無厭足摩睺羅伽王；

src_original: saṃsārodvignamānasaiśca ullokitavadanairdevaendraiḥ,
tgt_original: 常厭生死諸天王；

src_original: svakādvihārānniṣkramya bhagavantamanekaśatakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya anekākārayā pūjayitvā  bhagavato 'ntikādapakramya yena dakṣiṇāpathastena janapadacaryāṃ prakrāntaḥ //
tgt_original: 俱詣佛所，頭面禮足，設諸供養已，辭遊南方。

src_original: atha khalu āyuṣmān śariputro buddhānubhāvena adrākṣīnmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamanayā īdṛśyā bodhisattvavikurvitavyūhasaṃpadā jetavanānniṣkamya yena dakṣiṇā dik tenopasaṃkramamāṇam /
tgt_original: 爾時，尊者舍利弗承佛神力，見文殊師利童子，以菩薩莊嚴而自莊嚴，出祇洹林，遊行南方。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca asyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ janapadacaryāṃ prakrameyam /
tgt_original: 見已，作如是念： 「我今當與文殊師利菩薩俱行。

src_original: sa ṣaṣṭimātrairbhikṣubhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /  upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantamavalokya bhagavatābhyanujñāto  bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikātprakramya yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopajagāma
tgt_original: 」爾時，尊者舍利弗與六千比丘，眷屬圍遶，從自房出，來詣佛所，禮足辭退，向文殊師利。

src_original: sārdhaṃ taiḥ ṣaṣṭibhirbhikṣubhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
tgt_original: 此六千比丘是舍利弗共行弟子，皆新出家，其名曰：

src_original: yaduta sāgarabuddhinā ca bhikṣuṇā,  mahāsudatena ca bhikṣuṇā,  puṇyaprabheṇa ca mahāvatsena ca vibhudattena ca viśuddhacāriṇā ca devaśriyā ca indramatinā ca brahmottamena ca praśāntamatinā ca bhikṣuṇā /
tgt_original: 海智比丘、大善調伏比丘、功德光比丘、大童子比丘、電光興比丘、清淨行比丘、天妙德比丘、因陀羅慧比丘、梵天比丘、寂靜慧比丘；

src_original: evaṃpramukhaiḥ ṣaṣṭibhirbhikṣubhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是等六千比丘，已曾供養過去諸佛；

src_original: sarve ca te bhikṣavaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā dūrānugatādhimuktayaḥ śraddhānayapariśuddhā mahācetanāsamudācārā (Gv 37)  buddhadigvilokanasamarthā dharmasvabhāvaprakṛtiniṣpatticetasaḥ parahitapariṇatabuddhayastathāgataguṇābhilāṣiṇo mañjuśrīdharmadeśanāvainayikāḥ
tgt_original: 於諸佛所，種諸善根，性樂清淨，信心明徹，行諸大願，觀佛境界，了法實相，饒益眾生，常樂專求諸佛功德； 此等比丘，皆是文殊師利之所化度。

src_original: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputro gacchanneva mārgaṃ sarvāstān bhikṣūnavalokya sāgarabuddhiṃ
tgt_original: 爾時，尊者舍利弗觀察大眾，告海智比丘言：

src_original: bhikṣumāmantrayāmāsa - paśya sāgarabuddhe mañjuśriyo bodhisattvasya kāyapariśuddhimacintyāṃ sadevakena lokena,  lakṣaṇānuvyañjanavicitritāṃ prabhāmaṇḍalapariśuddhiṃ ca,  aprameyasattvasaṃjananīraśmijālavyūhaṃ ca,  aparimāṇasarvaduḥkhapraśamanaṃ parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca,
tgt_original: 「汝可觀察文殊師利菩薩清淨之身，相好莊嚴，一切天人，莫能思議，光明圓滿，令無量眾生，發歡喜心，放大莊嚴妙光明網，除滅眾生無量苦惱。

src_original: mārgavikramavyūhāṃśca sarvadigmaṇḍalābhimukhān vartamānān puṇyasamyagvyūhāṃśca vāmadakṣiṇena mahānidhānānyudvelāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 觀其功德所行道路，其傍悉有眾妙寶藏，自然發出；

src_original: pūrvabuddhopasthānakuśalamūlaniṣyandaiśca sarvavṛkṣakośebhyo vyūhā nirgacchanti /
tgt_original: 觀其供養過去諸佛，善根依果，從眾林樹出莊嚴藏；

src_original: sarvalokendrāḥ pūjāmeghānabhipravarṣantaḥ praṇamanti /
tgt_original: 觀彼一切諸天大王，恭敬禮拜，供養雲雨。 海智！

src_original: daśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatorṇākośebhyo raśmijālamaṇḍalāni niścaritvā sarvabuddhadharmānnigarjamānān mūrdhni nipatanti /
tgt_original: 汝觀文殊師利、一切如來，眉間毫相，放無量光，說諸佛法，悉入其頂。

src_original: evaṃpramukhānāyuṣmān śāriputro mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya aparimāṇān mārgakramaṇaguṇavyūhāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃdarśayati,
tgt_original: 」爾時，尊者舍利弗，為諸比丘讚說文殊師利無量功德，諸大莊嚴。

src_original: saṃtānāni caiṣāṃ karmaṇyāni bhavanti,  indriyāṇi prasīdanti,  saumanasyaṃ vivardhate,  daurmanasyaṃ prahīyate,  cittamalo 'pagacchati,
tgt_original: 其心清淨，離諸垢穢，身體柔軟，調伏諸根；

src_original: sarvāvaraṇāni vinivartante,
tgt_original: 遠離障礙；

src_original: buddhadarśanamabhimukhībhavati,  buddhadharmeṣu cittāni pariṇamanti,  bodhisattvendriyāṇi pariśuddhyante,
tgt_original: 現見諸佛，正求菩提，逮得菩薩清淨諸根；

src_original: bodhisattvaprasādavegā utpadyante,  mahākaruṇā saṃbhavati,  pāramitāmaṇḍalamavakrāmati,  mahāpraṇidhānāni saṃjāyante,  daśasu dikṣu buddhasamudrā ābhāsībhavanti /
tgt_original: 具菩薩力，長養大悲，入諸波羅蜜，發弘誓願，悉見十方諸如來海。

src_original: āyuṣmān śāriputra trairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya etadavocat - ime mañjuśrīḥ bhikṣavaḥ tvaddarśanakāmāḥ /
tgt_original: 願俱往詣文殊師利。 」爾時，尊者舍利弗，與諸比丘往詣其所； 到已，謂文殊師利：

src_original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto mahatā bodhisattvavikurvitena sārdha parṣanmaṇḍalapramāṇena bhūmimaṇḍalena nāgāvalokitena pratyudāvṛtya tān bhikṣūnavalokayāmāsa /
tgt_original: 「此諸比丘，皆新出家，欲見仁者。 」爾時，文殊師利童子即為顯現菩薩自在，如象王迴顧視比丘。

src_original: atha khalu te bhikṣavo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya añjalīn  pragṛhya etadavocan - anena vayaṃ satpuruṣa tvaddarśanakuśalamūlena yadapyasmākamanyatkuśalamūlaṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe,
tgt_original: 時，諸比丘頭面禮足，却住一面，合掌而立，作如是念：

src_original: upādhyāyaśca,  yacca bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pratyakṣam,  tena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena īdṛśā eva bhavem,
tgt_original: 「我等以此禮拜功德，知法實相，如和上舍利弗、釋迦牟尼世尊；

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilabhema,  evaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣam,  evaṃrūpāṇi lakṣaṇāni,  īdṛśāni vikurvitāni yādṛśāni tava //
tgt_original: 得清淨身，相好音聲，神力自在，如文殊師利。

src_original: evamukte ebhirbhikṣubhiḥ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastān bhikṣūnidamavocat - daśabhiraparikhedacittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā (Gv 38)  tathāgatabhūmimavakrāmati,  prāgeva bodhisattvabhūmim /
tgt_original: 」爾時，文殊師利告諸比丘： 「汝等當知，若善男子、善女人，成就十種大心，則得佛地，況菩薩地；

src_original: katamairdaśabhiḥ?
tgt_original: 何等為十？

src_original: yaduta sarvatathāgatadarśanaparyupāsanapūjopasthāneṣvaparikhedacittotpādena,  sarvakuśalamūlopacayeṣvanivartyāparikhedacittotpādena,  sarvadharmaparyeṣṭiṣvaparikhedacittotpādena,
tgt_original: 所謂： 發廣大心，長養一切善根，究竟不退，心無厭足； 見一切佛，恭敬供養，心無厭足； 正求一切佛法，心無厭足；

src_original: sarvabodhisattvapāramitāprayogeṣvaparikhedacittotpādena,  sarvabodhisattvasamādhipariniṣpādaneṣvaparikhedacittotpādena,
tgt_original: 遍行菩薩諸波羅蜜，心無厭足； 具足一切菩薩三昧，心無厭足；

src_original: sarvādhvaparaṃparāvatāreṣvaparikhedacittotpādena,
tgt_original: 於一切三世流轉，心無厭足；

src_original: daśadiksarvabuddhakṣetrasamudraspharaṇapariśuddhiṣu aparikhedacittotpādena,
tgt_original: 嚴淨佛剎，充滿十方，心無厭足；

src_original: sarvasattvadhātuparipākavinayeṣvaparikhedacittotpādena,
tgt_original: 教化成熟一切眾生，心無厭足；

src_original: sarvakṣetrakalpabodhisattvacaryānirhāreṣu aparikhedacittotpādena,
tgt_original: 於一切剎、一切劫中，行菩薩行，心無厭足；

src_original: sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamapāramitāprayogaikasattvaparipācanakrameṇa sarvasattvadhātuparipācanena,  ekatathāgatabalapariniṣpādaneṣu aparikhedacittotpādena /  ebhirbhikṣavo daśabhiraparikhedacittotpādaiḥ samanvāgataḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā saṃvartate sarvakuśalamūleṣu,  vivartate sarvasaṃsāragatibhyaḥ,
tgt_original: 發廣大心，修習一切佛剎微塵等諸波羅蜜，度脫一切眾生，具佛十力，心無厭足。

src_original: uccalati sarvalokavaṃśebhyaḥ,  atikrāmati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmibhyaśca /  saṃbhavati sarvatathāgatakulavaṃśeṣu,  saṃpadyate bodhisattvapraṇidhāneṣu,  viśudhyate sarvatathāgataguṇapratipattiṣu,
tgt_original: 若善男子、善女人，成就如是十種大法，則能長養一切善根，離生死趣一切世間性，超出聲聞、緣覺之地；

src_original: pariśudhyate sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu,  samudāgacchati sarvatathāgatabaleṣu,  pramardati sarvamāraparapravādinaḥ,  ākrāmati sarvabodhisattvabhūmīḥ,  āsannībhavati tathāgatabhūmeḥ //
tgt_original: 生如來家，具足成就菩薩大願，行菩薩行，住菩薩地，成就如來功德之力，降伏眾魔，制諸外道。

src_original: atha khalu te bhikṣava imaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā sarvabuddhavidarśanāsaṅgacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratyalabhanta,
tgt_original: 」彼諸比丘聞此法已，皆得無礙淨眼三昧；

src_original: yasyānubhāvāddaśadiganantāparyantalokadhātusthitāṃstathāgatān parṣanmaṇḍalānadrākṣuḥ /  ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvajagatyupapannāḥ sattvāstānaśeṣānadrākṣuḥ /
tgt_original: 悉見十方一切如來，及其眷屬，無量眾生；

src_original: tāṃśca lokadhātūn nānāvibhaktitānapaśyan /  yāni ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu paramāṇurajāṃsi,  ye ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nānāratnamayā bhavanavimānaparibhogāstānapi paśyanti sma /
tgt_original: 亦見種種世界形類，眾寶宮殿及諸微塵； 乃至如來十眼境界，皆悉覩見。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ svarāṅgasamudrānaśrauṣuḥ /  tāṃ ca dharmadeśanāṃ nānāpadavyañjananiruktimantranāmasaṃjñābhirājānanti sma /
tgt_original: 彼諸如來，以種種句身、味身，種種辯才，微妙音聲，所說法海，皆悉聞知。

src_original: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ cittendriyāśayān vyavalokayanti sma /
tgt_original: 彼世界中一切眾生，心念諸根，皆悉了知；

src_original: daśa ca pūrvāntāparāntajātiparivartānanusmaranti sma /
tgt_original: 知彼眾生，過去、未來，諸趣受生； 又能知彼過去、未來，各十劫事；

src_original: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ daśadharmacakraniruktinirhārānavataranti sma /  daśarddhivikurvitavihārān daśādeśanānayanirhārān daśānuśāstipadanirhārānavataranti sma /  teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ daśapratisaṃvinnayābhinirhārānavataranti sma /
tgt_original: 知彼如來十種本生、十種成就菩提自在、十種轉法輪、十種神力、十種教誡、十種說法、十種辯才。

src_original: sahapratilambhādasya samādherdaśabodhicittāṅgasahasrāṇi pariniṣpādayanti sma /
tgt_original: 得此三昧時，具足成就十種實際菩提之心；

src_original: daśasamādhisahasrāṇyavakrāmanti sma /  daśapāramitāṅgasahasrāṇi viśodhayanti sma /  te mahāvabhāsapratilabdhā mahāprajñāmaṇḍalāvabhāsitā daśa bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhante sma /
tgt_original: 一萬三昧，一萬淨波羅蜜，得大智慧圓滿光明，菩薩十明，住菩提心。

src_original: tān mṛdusūkṣmābhijñāṅkurapratilabdhān bodhicittotpādadṛḍhapratiṣṭhitān mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ samantabhadrāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ samādāpya pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
tgt_original: 爾時，文殊師利菩薩勸諸比丘，修普賢行，住普賢行。

src_original: te samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpratiṣṭhitā mahāpraṇidhānasamudrānavatīrya abhinirharanti sma /  te mahāpraṇidhānasāgarābhinirhṛtayā cittaviśuddhyā kāyaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhante sma /  kāyaviśuddhyā kāyalaghutāṃ pratilabhante sma,
tgt_original: 彼諸比丘，出生大願海；

src_original: yayā kāyaviśuddhyā (Gv 39)  kāyalaghutayā tānyabhijñāmukhāni vipulīkurvante,  acyutāgāminīrabhijñāḥ pratilabhante sma,
tgt_original: 生大願海已，身心清淨，得不死通明；

src_original: yenābhijñāpratilābhena mañjuśriyaśca kumārabhūtasya pādamūlānna calanti /  daśasu ca dikṣu sarvatathāgatakāyameghānabhinirharanti sma sarvabuddhadharmapariniṣpattaye //
tgt_original: 得是明已，不離此處，出生一切如來法身，充滿十方，具足一切佛法。

src_original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastān bhikṣūnanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya anupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena dakṣiṇāpathe dhanyākaraṃ nāma mahānagaraṃ tenopajagāma /
tgt_original: 爾時，文殊師利菩薩建立彼諸比丘菩提心已，與其眷屬，漸遊南方。

src_original: upetya dhanyākarasya mahānagarasya pūrveṇa vicitrasāradhvajavyūhaṃ nāma mahāvanaṣaṇḍaṃ  pūrvabuddhādhyuṣitacaityaṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhitaṃ sattvaparipākāya anantakṣetrānuravitanāmanirghoṣam,
tgt_original: 至覺城東，住莊嚴幢娑羅林中，大塔廟處，過去諸佛所遊止處；

src_original: yatra bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā aneke duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ,
tgt_original: 亦是過去諸佛為菩薩時，修苦行處。

src_original: yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe satatasamitaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ pūjāṃ pratyutsukāḥ,
tgt_original: 此處常為一切天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、人非人等之所供養。

src_original: tatra vāsamupagataḥ sārdhaṃ saparivāreṇa /  tatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto dharmadhātunayaprabhāsaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ prakāśayāmāsa daśasūtrāntakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprasravam /  tasya saṃprakāśayato mahāsamudrādanekāni nāgakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupasaṃkrāntāni /
tgt_original: 時，文殊師利即於此處，說普照一切法界修多羅，有百萬億修多羅，以為眷屬； 說此法時，於大海中，有無量千億龍王與眷屬俱，來詣文殊師利。

src_original: atha khalu mahādevo devaścaturdiśaṃ caturaḥ pāṇīn prasārya caturbhyo mahāsamudrebhyaḥ  paramaśīghrajavena vāryānīya svamukhaṃ prakṣālya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavakīrya
tgt_original: 」爾時，大天出四長臂，取四海水，澡洗其面，洗已，取諸金華以散善財，作如是言：

src_original: evamāha - sudurlabhadarśanā hi kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ,  paramadurlabhaśravaṇā āścaryaprādurbhāvā loke 'gratvāt paramapuruṣapuṇḍarīkā jagatrtrātāraḥ,
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 菩薩難聞、難見，乃是世間奇特之法。

src_original: pratiśaraṇabhūtā lokasya,  pratiṣṭhānabhūtā jagataḥ,  mahāvabhāsakarāḥ sattvānām,  kṣemapathadarśakāḥ saṃmūḍhamārgāṇām,
tgt_original: 諸男子中分陀利華，為眾生歸依，攝取、饒益、載育眾生，普照一切，顯現正道，遠離愚癡；

src_original: viśuddhakāyakarmaṇāmabhimukhā bhavanti /  vacanadoṣavivarjitānāṃ sarasvatyālokamavakrāmayanti /
tgt_original: 悉令得至一切智城，具足成就，淨身、口業，永離眾惡；

src_original: ahaṃ kulaputra meghajālasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
tgt_original: 善男子！ 我已成就菩薩雲網法門。

src_original: āha - ka etasya ārya meghajālasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
tgt_original: 」白言： 「大聖！ 此法門者，境界云何？

src_original: atha khalu mahādevoḥ devaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya purato mahāparvatamātraṃ suvarṇarāśimupadarśya
tgt_original: 」爾時，大天於善財前積天金聚，猶如山王。

src_original: rūpyarāśiṃ vaiḍūryarāśiṃ sphaṭikarāśiṃ musāragalvarāśiṃ aśmagarbharāśiṃ jyotirasamaṇiratnarāśiṃ  vimalagarbhamaṇiratnarāśiṃ vairocanamaṇiratnarāśiṃ samantadigabhimukhamaṇiratnarāśiṃ  cūḍāmaṇiratnamakuṭarāśiṃ vicitramaṇiratnarāśiṃ keyūrarāśiṃ kuṇḍalavibhūṣaṇarāśiṃ  valayarāśiṃ mekhalarāśiṃ nūpūrarāśiṃ vividhamaṇiratnarāśiṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgavibhūṣaṇarāśiṃ
tgt_original: 白銀、瑠璃、玻瓈、硨磲、碼碯、夜光離垢藏寶、明淨寶、諸方便門摩尼寶、周羅寶、瓔珞寶、吉由羅寶、莊嚴髮寶、莊嚴童子寶、彌阿羅莊嚴寶、彌拘羅寶、赤真珠寶、莊嚴一切諸肢節寶、如意珠寶，皆悉積聚，猶若山王。
